files.patch: @@ -70,1 +70,1 @@ - * Some resource scopes (see {@link #ofImplicit()}, {@link #globalScope()} are said to be implicit scopes. + * Some managed resource scopes are implicitly managed (see {@link #ofImplicit()}, {@link #globalScope()}, and are said to be implicit scopes. @@ -149,1 +149,1 @@ - * @return true if this scope is an an implicit scope. + * @return true if this scope is an implicit scope. @@ -247,1 +247,1 @@ - * Create a new implicit scope. The implicit scope is a shared and non-closeable scope which only features + * Create a new implicit scope. The implicit scope is a managed, shared, and non-closeable scope which only features
